name: Heatshield
description: Allows more efficient maneuvers around Titan and low Saturn orbit

name: Water Drop-tank
description: This expandable tank allows a ship to hold 10 extra counts of water.  Ejected during flight

name: Hydrogen Drop-tank
description: This expandable tank allows a ship to hold 10 extra counts of hydrogen.  Ejected during flight

name: Water extractor
description: Extracts water from icey moons

name: Primitive rock extractor
description: This low-tech rock extractor has been designed specifically to bootstrap a metal industry on small rocky moons and asteroids. It requires no advanced components.

name: Rock extractor
description: A more advanced, more efficient rock excrevator, worthy of a self-sufficient industrial power

name: Ore Extractor
description: Extracts aluminium and iron ore from rock. Fundamental part in metallurgy

name: Carbon Filter
description: Extracts carbon from the atmosphere. Performs suboptimally outside of an atmosphere

name: Electrolyser
description: Splits water into hydrogen and oxygen by applying a voltage.

name: Fuel cell
description: Recombines hydrogen and oxygen into water. This reaction releases energy

name: Steel Smelter
description: The steel smelting industry is vital for any major construction project.

name: Aluminium Smelter
description: Aluminium alloys are indespensible for high-strength, low-weight  products, like ships.

name: Habitat
description: A collection of residential, commercial and service buildings that can accomodate around 1500 people in total.

name: Carbon Splitter
description: Splits carbon dioxide into oxygen and carbon

name: Waste Treatment
description: Part of the life support system, cleaning and repurposing water from habitats

name: Farms
description: A combination of aquaponics and densly packed bean, fungus and fruit plantages.

name: Polymers Factory
description: Polymers are one of the most versitile and useful materials in human history. They are required in lots of advanced products

name: Semiconductor Laboratory
description: TBD (warrants a large desription)

name: Small shipyard offices
description: Administrative and design offices. Needed in order to build ships

name: Shipyard storage facility
description: Warehouses for storing parts and material. Needed for larger, more complex production pipelines, like that of ships

name: Workshop
description: Construction Workshops. Needed in order to build most ships and modules or repair ships

name: Wet Dock
description: Dock, where ships can be build and repaired. 'Wet' docks keep ships exposed to the vacuum.

name: Dry Dock
description: Dock, where ships can be build and repaired. 'Dry' docks pressurize the entire area around the ship. Construction in dry-docks is much more efficient, but the large volume of atmosphere leaks air at a significnat rate.

name: Clean room
description: Clean rooms are required to manufacture special high-tech components, like electronics, optics or medicine.

name: Railgun
description: High-velocity kinetic weapon that needs extra energy to fire.

name: Missiles
description: Tactical non-nuclear missiles. Basic ordonance used in combat

name: Light armor
description: A lighter, thinner armor, granting basic protection to ships.

name: Armor
description: A full suite of heavy armor for military ships

name: Point-defence cannons
description: High-volume machine cannons provide a good defence against missiles, torpedos and drones.

name: High-fi Attitude Control System
description: A high-accuracy attitude controle system ensuring precise targeting is crucial to strike before anybody else does.

name: Sailed Reactor
description: While most ship classes have a power regeneration system that can support the most basic ship functions, some modules require a dedicated, 'sailed'  reactor.

name: Geothermal power plant
description: On tidally active worlds, it can be usefull to harvest the power of thides directly

name: Platoon of the Expeditionary brigade
description: TODO

name: Invasion Equipment
description: small arms, APCs, supplies, even tanks ... Everything to arm local forces with lethal equipment.

name: Aircraft
description: Very effective fighting force uniquely suited for atmospheric planetary bodies (Titan)
